title: Which technology is used in automatic gates? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume “automatic gate” is used in a private driveway? You need a sensor to tell when a car is waiting. It can be a light and send photocell across the road, or a coil of wire in the road. Car parked over the coil increases the inductance, which lowers the frequency of an oscillator. You need a motor of course, and limit switches.
